alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 10 at 12:22PM AKST until February 11 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Visibility Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Whiteout conditions expected. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 6 PM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 60 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
